actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to increase the per diem, transportation, and travel expense allowance of Farmers Home Administration county committeemen.

summary.text: Increases the per diem, transportation and travel expense allowance of Farmers Home Administration county committeemen.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to increase the per diem, transportation, and travel expense allowance of Farmers Home Administration county committeemen.
